function ERI_EP04_08()
    --.起-6【11月第3週】「お忍びデート大作戦」
    SaveData.Title = "お忍びデート大作戦"

    --//BG：駅前
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav")

    MSG([[ Waiting at the station nearest to Yuriai Private Academy, Hermes arrived right on time. ]])
    --//BU：エルメス（笑顔・私服）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0247.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "Hehehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Sorry to keep you waiting, Erika-chan<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])
    --//注釈￥はハート

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised・casual
 "You're Hermes-san, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0248.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】serious・casual
 "Pfft! What’s with that reaction? It’s Hermes, the real deal, you know? Don’t I look cute today?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile・casual
 "No, of course you do. It’s just that, well, the contrast with your usual self is really refreshing." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ She had switched completely from her usual girly frilly outfit. With a hat and round glasses hiding her face, a shirt with flashy patterns and shorts, she looked like someone who might hawk shady goods at an open-air market. ]])

    MSG([[ Hiding her captivating eyes behind sunglasses, removing the crown-shaped hair ornament that usually attracts attention, and letting her hair down, she looked like a completely different person. ]])

    MSG([[ Yet, she still couldn’t hide her charm, and it was strange how naturally people’s gazes were drawn to her. In fact, everyone passing by the station besides me naturally looked toward Hermes when near her. ]])

    MSG([[ Seems like clothing alone can’t conceal her allure. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1024.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】normal・casual
 "Well then, what should we do? Is there anywhere you want to go?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0249.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】normal・casual
 "Hmmm, somewhere I want to go? Uuuuuuuuuuun…" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes crouched down, holding her head and groaning. Is it really something to worry about so much…? ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0250.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】normal・casual
 "Nowhere!!!!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1025.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile・casual
 "Nothing, huh…" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I thought she wanted to go somewhere since she was so eager for a date, but that didn’t seem to be the case. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1026.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】normal・casual
 "It doesn’t have to be a special place. Even ordinary places you’d usually hang out at are fine." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0251.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】normal・casual
 "What’s an ordinary place? How do normal people play? Tell me, tell me!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1027.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised・casual
 "Um. Ordinary means…" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I couldn’t answer immediately. I realized the words I casually said might be inappropriate and felt a little regretful. ]])

    MSG([[ What’s normal for me might not be normal for an idol like Hermes-san. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1028.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】normal・casual
 "What do you usually do on your days off, Hermes-san?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0252.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】normal・casual
 "If I had a day off, I’d just get work scheduled! Because there might be people who can only come see me then!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1029.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised・casual
 "Th-then in between work…!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ea")
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0253.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "I do things like training my body and voice, moving a lot and singing loudly, so I can make even more people happy!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0254.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "I’d be sad if the people who met me before thought I was the same as last time! I want to be even cuter tomorrow, so I can’t just stay still<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1030.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered・casual
 "But you want to shop and eat too, right? What do you do then?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02fc")
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0255.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】wry smile・casual
 "Hehehe<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> If I want something or want to eat something, my mom gets it for me right away! She even flies me to where I want to go by helicopter!" ]])

    MSG([[ Come to think of it, she was even picked up by helicopter at school one night. That might be an everyday thing for Hermes. It’s a life I couldn’t even imagine. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02aa")
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0256.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】normal・casual
 "But my mom won’t get me friends. That’s why I’m so happy to meet with Erika-chan like this<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1031.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile・casual
 "Thank you. I’m happy too." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ For her, who runs full speed as an idol in show business, buying a snack after school, shopping on a day off, or chatting casually with friends must all be special things. ]])

    MSG([[ Since she always makes everyone smile, today I want to make Hermes-san laugh a lot. No selfish thoughts, I truly felt that. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1032.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】normal・casual
 "Well then, shall we start by strolling around the downtown area?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1033.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】smile・casual
 "Yakase Shopping Street has lots of stores lined up, and it’s fun just to look around." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ea")
PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0257.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "Ehh~!? I’m so excited! I really love shopping streets, they’re just so cute<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1034.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】surprised・casual
 "Cute, you say, a shopping street?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0258.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "Yeah, cute~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Retro and warm, with the feeling that the customers and shopkeepers are close, it really tugs at the heartstrings~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0259.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "I love things with history! Because that’s proof they’ve been loved for a looong time!" ]])

    MSG([[ Speaking in high spirits like that, Hermes grabbed my hand and started pulling me along firmly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ib")
    ERU_PARTICLE_01(150, 0, 0, 100, 500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0260.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】wink・casual
 "Come on, let’s go quickly<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> We’re going to play all day today!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1035.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered・casual
 "W-wait! That’s the exact opposite direction from the shopping street!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ And so, a secret date with a national idol began. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    --//BG：繁華街
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG004aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask002" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ Near Yakase Shopping Street, along the main road, there were many kinds of shops—from eateries to antique furniture and stationery stores. ]])

    MSG([[ Whenever Hermes found a shop that caught her interest, she would immediately run over, excitedly telling me about it. ]])

    MSG([[ At a certain stationery shop. ]])

    -- //CI：089
    LAYER_LOAD(50, "CI089a")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
--    WAIT(1000)
--    LAYER_LOAD(50, "")
--    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

--    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ea")
--    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
--    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
--    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0261.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "Look, look! This shop sells tons of stationery I’ve never seen before!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1036.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】smile・casual
 "Wow, it’s cute. It looks like a stationery store that stocks lots of original items." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0262.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "This geometry-like letter set might be great as a thank-you gift for my fans! If I give it out at the handshake event to kids who send fan letters, I wonder if they’d be happy~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1037.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile・casual
 "They’d definitely be happy. Getting a letter back from your favorite idol would bring fans to tears." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I remember Akira recently crying tears of joy getting a letter back from her favorite female voice actress. ]])

    MSG([[ To get a letter handed directly from a national idol must be like a dream for fans. ]])

    MSG([[ In the end, Hermes bought all of those letter sets in stock. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

    MSG([[ At a certain secondhand bookstore. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0263.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】surprised・casual
 "E-Erika-chan! Look at that! There are so many bookshelves outside the store! And tons of boxes full of books!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】normal・casual
 "Ah, that store sometimes displays and sells old books like that." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0264.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "Wow~~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Amazing, amazing! It’s like a vegetable market for books!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1039.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile・casual
 "Now that you mention it, it does look like vegetables for sale outside a store." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was surprised when I first saw it too. It looked like a flea market venue right in front of that shop, with huge amounts of books piled outside. ]])

    MSG([[ Though it would be easy to steal a book if you wanted, as Hermes mentioned earlier, the town feels calm and warm. ]])

    MSG([[ I had no reason to believe so, but I felt sure no one would steal. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0265.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "I’ll just slip my photo book in here." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered
 "Don’t add your own books like you’re just ‘whisking eggs’ or something!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ I hurriedly pulled Hermes’ hand and left the shop. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG004aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015",1000,false)

    MSG([[ At a certain antique shop. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0266.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "Shelves! Erika-chan, they’re just selling shelves! How funny<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】smile・casual
 "That store sells all kinds of old stuff from antique furniture to electric appliances. Some pieces are over a hundred years old." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1042.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile・casual
 "But the big shelf clearance sale is a first for me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0267.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】surprised・casual
 "Whaaaat!? Amazing!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0268.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "They’re even selling school desks and chairs!? So cute, maybe I’ll buy them and take them home!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0269.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】sad・casual
 "But my mom said no wasting money… but with these desks and chairs, I could study even harder…" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0270.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】sad・casual
 "Ughh~! I’m so conflicted my head and body are spinning!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1043.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】flustered・casual
 "Why is your body spinning too!?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Hermes started spinning like a top right there, and I pulled her out from in front of the store again. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：繁華街（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG004ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ After circling from the street along the main road to the Yakase arcade, the sun was already starting to set. ]])

    MSG([[ Surely it was about time for Hermes to head home. ]])

    MSG([[ When I asked what she wanted to eat for our last meal, I got a surprising answer. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0271.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "I want to go to a hamburger shop!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    --//BG：ハンバーガー屋
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG001aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask001" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I took Hermes to the burger place we usually go to after school. ]])

    MSG([[ A common chain where you could buy a hamburger for 100 yen. ]])

    MSG([[ Yet Hermes looked very happy, smiling as she looked around the store. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1044.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】normal・casual
 "The order has arrived, so let’s get a seat. How about that window seat?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERU02ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0272.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】smile・casual
 "Hehehe! Thanks, Erika-chan! I’m excited~" ]])

    MSG([[ As soon as she sat down, Hermes opened her burger and started eating with a big mouthful. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --//CG：ハンバーガーを食べるエルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0273.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Delicious~~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart"> Amazing, right? And it’s only 100 yen! I wish I could visit my fans in such a reasonable way too~" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1045.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Do you like this place that much?" ]])

    MSG([[ She looked so happy that I couldn’t help but ask. Hermes answered while chewing her burger and looking around. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0274.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Yeah, because everyone here looks so happy talking!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0275.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The places my mom takes me to are dark and quiet, and everyone has serious faces. They don’t look very happy…" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0276.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "So I was relieved to see everyone actually laughing out loud here. Hamburger shops are strange, huh?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1046.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Haha, fancy places are a bit much for students, huh?" ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t imagine Hermes sitting still in a fancy store. For her, this burger place might be more fun than any expensive restaurant. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1047.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "You really love seeing smiles, don’t you?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0277.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Yeah! My mom told me when I was just born<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> ‘You were born to make everyone smile’!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0278_1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "I don’t remember that time at all, but those words are engraved firmly in my heart." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0278_2.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "So I want to do anything to make everyone smile~<sprite="Emoji" name="heart">" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0279.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ah!? S-sorry! I shouldn’t always relate everything back to work even though you’re kindly going on a date with me, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0280.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Ugh, I just can’t help it… I can’t get my fans out of my head…" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1048.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Don’t worry. That’s the right attitude for an idol." ]])

    MSG([[ That also means Hermes’ feelings are very sincere. ]])

    MSG([[ Spending a day together made me realize how genuinely good-hearted she is. ]])

    MSG([[ But precisely because of that, questions only grew. ]])

    MSG([[ How could such a kind-hearted Hermes have taken the Princess Throne from Marika? I didn’t understand why. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1049.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】serious
 (No good... I can’t figure this out by myself. I have to ask her directly!) ]])

    MSG([[ I could no longer hold back and resolved to ask her the question. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1050.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Hermes-san, you did run against Marika in the Princess Election, right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1051.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Looking at you now, I feel like you’d be against taking the throne from Marika... What was the reason you joined the Princess Election?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0281.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "The Princess Election with Marika-chan..." ]])
    --//CG：ハンバーガーを食べるエルメス（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV020ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

    MSG([[ Hermes’ expression darkened suddenly, and my heart skipped a beat. ]])

    MSG([[ Just like when I brought it up last time. She really doesn’t want to talk about this. ]])

    MSG([[ But I couldn’t back down now. I kept my composure and pressed on to get the truth. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1052.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "After the election, Marika left Yuriai without telling me or Minato the reason. I want to know what caused that." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1053.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Sorry for bringing up such a painful topic, but any information you have would help." ]])

    MSG([[ Long silence. In the suffocating atmosphere, Hermes slowly spoke. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0282_1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "...It’s okay. I’m not the only one who’s sad that Marika-chan is gone." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0282_2.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Erika-chan and Mina-chan, her family, are even more heartbroken." ]])
    --//CG：ハンバーガーを食べるエルメス（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV020aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0283.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Sorry for making a worried face! I’m a failure as an idol! But I’ll tell you everything I know!" ]])

    MSG([[ Hermes suddenly smiled brightly and continued speaking. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0284.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "Actually, at first I thought I didn’t have to enter the Princess Election. I already became the 'Princess' I admired and wanted to focus on being an idol." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0285.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hermes】
 "But then Daria-chan encouraged me: ‘Aiming for number one is your duty as an idol.’ ‘Be number one at the academy and make your fans smile.’" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1054.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Daria-san encouraged you?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hermes_0286.wav")
